question: Which of the following kings brought the Eastern Chalukyas and Gangas of Talakad under the control of the Rashtrakuta kingdom?
explanation: King Dhruva who ruled the Rashtrakuta empire fromÂ  780 A.D to 793 A.D ascended the throne after replacing his elder brother Govinda II. He led many successful expeditions. He also brought the Eastern Chalukyas and Gangas of Talakad under his control.
